# INCallCapability

**Enumeration**

Constants indicating the capabilities of the call.

## Declaration

```swift
enum INCallCapability
```

## Constants

- **INCallCapability.unknown**: An unknown type of call.
- **INCallCapability.audioCall**: An audio call.
- **INCallCapability.videoCall**: A video call.

## Initializers

- **init(rawValue:)**

## Getting the Call Details

- **callRecordType**: The type of call that resulted from the attempt.
- **callCapability**: The audio and video capabilities of the call.
- **dateCreated**: The date and time at which the call was initiated.
- **callDuration**: The duration (measured in seconds) of the call.
- **unseen**: A Boolean value indicating whether the user has seen the call.
- **numberOfCalls**: The number of calls in the call record.
- **participants**: The recipient of the user’s call request.

## Conforms To

- BitwiseCopyable
- Equatable
- Hashable
- RawRepresentable
- Sendable
- SendableMetatype
